Merge pull request #56 from albtsantos/master

Crash prevention on the gestureRecognizerToFailPan property
Crash prevention on the gestureRecognizerToFailPan property

Merge pull request #52 from albtsantos/master

Gesture improvements
Inside the swipe class, checking the velocity of it on touch move
Checking the existence of the modal swipe when setting the draggable property
Adding a gestureRecognizer property that should fail with the modal gesture
Making the gesture available as a readonly property from the header
#49 no need to call appearance methods in fullscreen style. also remove those calls in cancel interactive transition
use weak reference to modal VC #44, remove unnecessary set nil

Revert "ensure that the strongly referenced modelController gets released when the animator is finished"

This reverts commit d086bfdad3a4bfa5ff702851a68062f32c3c5433.

ensure that the strongly referenced modelController gets released when the animator is finished

Thus we can avoid having circular dependencies between the animator and
any view controller, which may cause the view controller to
not-get-deallocated.
Allow that 'draggable' can be deactivated and the animator properly disables the gesture recognizer setup

add necessary appearance method calls for view controllers

remove calls for the modal view controller

rename scaleDownRatio to behindViewScale, added behindViewAlpha
